text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-PersonDisabilityType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    1Vision impairedVision impaired
    2Hearing impairedHearing impaired
    3Speech impairedSpeech impaired
    4Mentally impairedMentally impaired
  • Import all the codes that are contained in MobilityImpaired

name: PersonDisabilityType
title: PersonDisabilityType
description: A code identifying a person's disability.
